pullRequest.title: Add config option to hide join/quit messages above X players
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add "hide-join-quit-messages-above" option, which will hide join and quit messages above a certain player count.
Closes #3347.

commit.message:
Add config option to hide join/quit messages above X players
Add "hide-join-quit-messages-above" option, which will hide join and quit messages above a certain player count.

Closes #3347.

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Josh Roy <10731363+JRoy@users.noreply.github.com>
